name: src/Box2.js
v
description: A vector.

name: Box2
description: A 2D box.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new box.

name: min
description: The lower bounds.

name: max
description: The upper bounds.

name: set
description: Sets the values of this box.

name: copy
description: Copies the values of a given box.

name: clone
description: Clones this box.

name: makeEmpty
description:
Makes this box empty.

The lower bounds are set to infinity and the upper bounds to negative
infinity to create an infinitely small box.

name: isEmpty
description:
Indicates whether this box is truly empty.

This is a more robust check for emptiness since the volume can get positive
with two negative axes.

name: getCenter
description: Computes the center of this box.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

return.description: A vector that describes the center of this box.

name: getSize
description: Computes the size of this box.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

return.description: A vector that describes the size of this box.

name: getBoundingSphere
description: Computes the bounding sphere of this box.

params.name: target
params.description: A target sphere. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

return.description: The bounding sphere of this box.

name: expandByPoint
description: Expands this box by the given point.

name: expandByVector
description: Expands this box by the given vector.

name: expandByScalar
description: Expands this box by the given scalar.

name: setFromPoints
description: Defines this box by the given points.

name: setFromCenterAndSize
description: Defines this box by the given center and size.

name: clampPoint
description: Clamps the given point to the boundaries of this box.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: distanceToPoint
description: Calculates the distance from this box to the given point.

name: translate
description: Translates this box.

name: intersect
description: Intersects this box with the given one.

name: union
description: Expands this box by combining it with the given one.

name: containsPoint
description: Checks if the given point lies inside this box.

return.description: Whether this box contains the point.

name: containsBox
description: Checks if the given box lies inside this box.

return.description: Whether this box contains the given one.

name: intersectsBox
description: Checks if this box intersects the given one.

name: equals
description: Checks if this box equals the given one.

return.description: Whether this box equals the given one.

name: src/Box3.js
v
description: A vector.

name: points
description: A list of points.

name: Box3
description: A 3D box.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new box.

name: min
description: The lower bounds.

name: max
description: The upper bounds.

name: set
description: Sets the values of this box.

name: copy
description: Copies the values of a given box.

name: clone
description: Clones this box.

name: makeEmpty
description:
Makes this box empty.

The lower bounds are set to infinity and the upper bounds to negative
infinity to create an infinitely small box.

name: isEmpty
description:
Indicates whether this box is truly empty.

This is a more robust check for emptiness since the volume can get positive
with two negative axes.

name: getCenter
description: Computes the center of this box.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

return.description: A vector that describes the center of this box.

name: getSize
description: Computes the size of this box.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

return.description: A vector that describes the size of this box.

name: getBoundingSphere
description: Computes the bounding sphere of this box.

params.name: target
params.description: A target sphere. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

return.description: The bounding sphere of this box.

name: expandByPoint
description: Expands this box by the given point.

name: expandByVector
description: Expands this box by the given vector.

name: expandByScalar
description: Expands this box by the given scalar.

name: setFromPoints
description: Defines this box by the given points.

name: setFromCenterAndSize
description: Defines this box by the given center and size.

name: clampPoint
description: Clamps the given point to the boundaries of this box.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: distanceToPoint
description: Calculates the distance from this box to the given point.

name: applyMatrix4
description: Applies the given matrix to this box.

name: translate
description: Translates this box.

name: intersect
description: Intersects this box with the given one.

name: union
description: Expands this box by combining it with the given one.

name: containsPoint
description: Checks if the given point lies inside this box.

return.description: Whether this box contains the point.

name: containsBox
description: Checks if the given box lies inside this box.

return.description: Whether this box contains the given one.

name: intersectsBox
description: Checks if this box intersects the given one.

name: intersectsSphere
description: Checks if this box intersects the given sphere.

return.description: Whether the box intersects the sphere.

name: intersectsPlane
description:
Checks if this box intersects the given plane.

Computes the minimum and maximum dot product values. If those values are on
the same side (back or front) of the plane, then there is no intersection.

return.description: Whether the box intersects the plane.

name: equals
description: Checks if this box equals the given one.

return.description: Whether this box equals the given one.

name: src/Cylindrical.js
Cylindrical
description:
A cylindrical coordinate system.

For details see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cylindrical_coordinate_system

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new cylindrical system.

name: radius
description: The distance from the origin to a point in the XZ-plane.

name: theta
description:
The counterclockwise angle in the XZ-plane measured in radians from the
positive Z-axis.

name: y
description: The height above the XZ-plane.

name: set
description: Sets the values of this cylindrical system.

name: copy
description: Copies the values of the given cylindrical system.

name: clone
description: Clones this cylindrical system.

name: setFromVector3
description: Sets the values of this cylindrical system.

name: src/Euler.js
clamp
description: Clamps the given value.

name: m
description: A matrix.

name: q
description: A quaternion.

name: Euler
description: Euler angles.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new set of Euler angles.

name: x
description: The rotation around the X-axis.

name: y
description: The rotation around the Y-axis.

name: z
description: The rotation around the Z-axis.

name: order
description: The rotation order.

name: set
description: Sets the Euler angles and rotation order.

name: copy
description: Copies the values of another set of Euler angles.

name: clone
description: Clones this set of Euler angles.

return.description: A clone of this set of Euler angles.

name: fromArray
description: Copies angles and the rotation order from an array.

name: toArray
description: Stores this set of Euler angles and the rotation order in an array.

name: toVector3
description: Stores this set of Euler angles in a vector.

params.name: vector
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: setFromRotationMatrix
description: Copies the rotation from a given matrix.

params.name: m
params.description: A rotation matrix. The upper 3x3 is assumed to be a pure rotation matrix (i.e. unscaled).

name: setFromQuaternion
description: Copies the rotation from a given quaternion.

name: setFromVector3
description: Copies the rotation from a given vector.

name: reorder
description:
Reorder the rotation angles.

WARNING: this operation discards revolution information!

name: equals
description: Checks if this set of Euler angles equals the given one.

return.description: Whether this set of Euler angles equals the given one.

name: defaultOrder
description: The default rotation order.

name: src/Frustum.js
v0
description: A vector.

name: v1
description: A vector.

name: Frustum
description: A frustum.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new frustum.

name: planes
description: The six planes that form the frustum.

name: set
description: Sets the planes of this frustum.

name: clone
description: Clones this frustum.

name: copy
description: Copies a given frustum.

name: setFromMatrix
description: Sets this frustm based on a given 4x4 matrix.

name: intersectsSphere
description: Checks if this frustum intersects with the given sphere.

return.description: Whether this frustum intersects with the sphere.

name: intersectsBox
description: Checks if this frustum intersects with the given sphere.

return.description: Whether this frustum intersects with the box.

name: containsPoint
description: Checks if this frustum contains the given point.

return.description: Whether this frustum contains the point.

name: src/index.js

a
description: A vector.

name: b
description: A vector.

name: Line3
description: A line.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new line.

params.name: start
params.description: The starting point. If none is provided, a new vector will be created.

params.name: end
params.description: The ending point. If none is provided, a new vector will be created.

name: start
description: The starting point.

name: end
description: The ending point.

name: set
description: Sets the starting and ending point of this line.

name: copy
description: Copies the values of the given line.

name: clone
description: Clones this line.

name: getCenter
description: Calculates the center of this line.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: delta
description: Calculates the delta vector of this line.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

return.description: The delta vector of this line.

name: lengthSquared
description: Calculates the squared length of this line.

name: length
description: Calculates the length of this line.

name: at
description: Adjusts this line to point in the given direction.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: closestPointToPointParameter
description: Returns a point parameter based on the closest point as projected on the line segement.

params.name: clampToLine
params.description: Whether the point should be clamped to the line.

name: closestPointToPoint
description: Returns the closest point on the line.

params.name: clampToLine
params.description: Whether the point should be clamped to the line.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: equals
description: Checks if this line equals the given one.

description: Sets this matrix to the identity matrix.

description: Copies the values of a given matrix.

name: identity
description: Sets this matrix to the identity matrix.

name: copy
description: Copies the values of a given matrix.

name: clone
description: Clones this matrix.

name: fromArray
description: Copies the values of a given array.

name: toArray
description: Stores this matrix in an array.

name: getMaxScaleOnAxis
description: Returns the largest scale.

name: copyPosition
description: Copies the position values of a given matrix.

name: setPosition
description: Sets the position values of this matrix.

name: extractBasis
description: Extracts the basis from this matrix.

params.name: xAxis
params.description: A vector to store the X-axis column in.

params.name: yAxis
params.description: A vector to store the Y-axis column in.

params.name: zAxis
params.description: A vector to store the Z-axis column in.

name: makeBasis
description: Sets the basis of this matrix.

name: extractRotation
description: Extracts the rotation from a given matrix.

name: makeRotationFromEuler
description: Sets the matrix rotation based on the given Euler angles.

name: makeRotationFromQuaternion
description: Sets the matrix rotation based on the given quaternion.

name: lookAt
description: Creates a rotation that looks at the given target.

name: multiplyMatrices
description: Sets this matrix to the product of the given matrices.

name: multiply
description: Multiplies this matrix with the given one.

name: premultiply
description: Multiplies a given matrix with this one.

name: multiplyScalar
description: Multiplies this matrix with a given scalar.

name: determinant
description:
Calculates the determinant of this matrix.

For more details see:
 http://www.euclideanspace.com/maths/algebra/matrix/functions/inverse/fourD/index.htm

name: getInverse
description:
Inverts the given matrix and stores the result in this matrix.

For details see:
 http://www.euclideanspace.com/maths/algebra/matrix/functions/inverse/fourD/index.htm

params.name: matrix
params.description: The matrix that should be inverted.

name: transpose
description: Transposes this matrix.

name: scale
description: Scales this matrix.

name: makeScale
description: Makes this matrix a scale matrix.

name: makeTranslation
description: Makes this matrix a translation matrix.

name: makeRotationX
description: Makes this matrix a rotation matrix.

name: makeRotationY
description: Makes this matrix a rotation matrix with respect to the Y-axis.

name: makeRotationZ
description: Makes this matrix a rotation matrix with respect to the Z-axis.

name: makeRotationAxis
description:
Makes this matrix a translation matrix with respect to a specific axis.

For mor einformation see:
 http://www.gamedev.net/reference/articles/article1199.asp

params.name: axis
params.description: The axis. Assumed to be normalized.

name: makeShear
description: Makes this matrix a shear matrix.

name: compose
description: Sets this matrix based on the given position, rotation and scale.

name: decompose
description: Decomposes this matrix into a position, rotation and scale vector.

name: makePerspective
description: Creates a perspective matrix.

params.name: left
params.description: The distance to the left plane.

params.name: right
params.description: The distance to the right plane.

params.name: top
params.description: The distance to the top plane.

params.name: bottom
params.description: The distance to the bottom plane.

params.name: near
params.description: The distance to the near plane.

params.name: far
params.description: The distance to the far plane.

name: makeOrthographic
description: Creates an orthographic matrix.

params.name: left
params.description: The distance to the left plane.

params.name: right
params.description: The distance to the right plane.

params.name: top
params.description: The distance to the top plane.

params.name: bottom
params.description: The distance to the bottom plane.

params.name: near
params.description: The distance to the near plane.

params.name: far
params.description: The distance to the far plane.

name: equals
description: Checks if this matrix equals the given one.

name: src/Plane.js
a
description: A vector.

description: A vector.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new plane.

name: constant

name: set
description: Sets the normal and the constant.

params.description: The X component of the normal.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y component of the normal.

params.name: z
params.description: The Z component of the normal.

name: copy
description: Copies the given plane.

name: clone
description: Clones this plane.

description: Sets this plane from a normal and a coplanar point.

name: setFromCoplanarPoints
description: Sets this plane from three distinct coplanar points.

name: normalize
description: Normalizes this plane.

name: negate
description: Negates this plane.

name: distanceToPoint
description: Calculates the distance from this plane to the given point.

name: distanceToSphere
description: Calculates the distance from this plane to the given sphere.

name: projectPoint
description: Projects the given point on this plane.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: coplanarPoint
description: Calculates a coplanar point and returns it.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: translate
description: Translates this plane.

name: intersectLine
description: Finds the point of intersection between this plane and a given line.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: intersectsLine
description: Checks if this plane intersects with the given line.

return.description: Whether this plane intersects with the given line.

name: intersectsBox
description: Checks if this plane intersects with the given box.

return.description: Whether this plane intersects with the given box.

name: intersectsSphere

return.description: Whether this plane intersects with the given sphere.

name: equals

return.description: Whether this plane equals the given one.

name: src/Quaternion.js
v
description: A vector.

name: Quaternion
description: A quaternion.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new quaternion.

name: x
description: The X component.

name: y
description: The Y component.

name: z
description: The Z component.

name: w
description: The W component.

name: set
description: Sets the components of this quaternion.

name: copy
description: Copies the components of the given quaternion.

name: clone
description: Clones this quaternion.

name: fromArray
description: Copies values from an array.

name: toArray
description: Stores this quaternion in an array.

name: setFromEuler
description:
Sets the components of this quaternion based on the given Euler angles.

For more details see: https://goo.gl/XRD1kr

name: setFromAxisAngle
description:
Sets the components of this quaternion based on a given axis angle.

For more information see:
 http://www.euclideanspace.com/maths/geometry/rotations/conversions/angleToQuaternion/index.htm

params.name: axis
params.description: The axis. Assumed to be normalized.

name: setFromRotationMatrix
description:
Sets the components of this quaternion based on a given rotation matrix.

For more information see:
 http://www.euclideanspace.com/maths/geometry/rotations/conversions/matrixToQuaternion/index.htm

params.name: m
params.description: The rotation matrix. The upper 3x3 is assumed to be a pure rotation matrix (i.e. unscaled).

name: setFromUnitVectors
description: Sets the components of this quaternion based on unit vectors.

params.name: vFrom
params.description: A unit vector. Assumed to be normalized.

params.name: vTo
params.description: A unit vector. Assumed to be normalized.

name: invert
description: Inverts this quaternion. The quaternion is assumed to have unit length.

name: conjugate
description: Conjugates this quaternion.

name: lengthSquared
description: Calculates the squared length of this quaternion.

name: length
description: Calculates the length of this quaternion.

name: normalize
description: Normalizes this quaternion.

name: dot
description: Calculates the dot product with a given vector.

name: multiplyQuaternions
description:
Multiplies the given quaternions and stores the result in this quaternion.

For more details see:
 http://www.euclideanspace.com/maths/algebra/realNormedAlgebra/quaternions/code/index.htm

name: multiply
description:
Multiplies this quaternion with the given one and stores the result in
this quaternion.

name: premultiply
description:
Multiplies the given quaternion with this one and stores the result in
this quaternion.

name: slerp
description:
Performs a spherical linear interpolation towards the given quaternion.

For more details see:
 http://www.euclideanspace.com/maths/algebra/realNormedAlgebra/quaternions/slerp/

name: equals
description: Checks if this quaternions equals the given one.

name: slerp
description: Performs a spherical linear interpolation.

params.name: qr
params.description: A quaternion to store the result in.

name: slerpFlat
description: Performs an array-based spherical linear interpolation.

params.name: dst
params.description: An array to store the result in.

params.name: dstOffset
params.description: An offset into the destination array.

params.name: src0
params.description: An array that contains the base quaternion values.

params.name: src0Offset
params.description: An offset into the base array.

params.name: src1
params.description: An array that contains the target quaternion values.

params.name: src1Offset
params.description: An offset into the target array.

name: src/Ray.js
v
description: A list of vectors.

name: Ray
description: A ray.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new ray.

name: origin
description: The origin.

name: direction
description: The direction.

name: set
description: Sets the origin and the direction.

name: copy
description: Copies the given ray.

name: clone
description: Clones this ray.

name: at
description: Computes a point along the ray based on a given scalar t.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: lookAt
description: Rotates this ray to look at the given target.

name: recast
description: Moves the origin along the ray by a given scalar t.

name: closestPointToPoint
description: Finds the closest point along this ray to a given point.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: distanceSquaredToPoint
description: Calculates the squared distance from this ray to the given point.

name: distanceToPoint
description: Calculates the distance from this ray to the given point.

name: distanceToPlane
description: Calculates the distance from this ray to the given plane.

return.description: The distance, or null if the denominator is zero.

name: distanceSquaredToSegment
description:
Calculates the distance from this ray to a given line segment.

Based on:
 http://www.geometrictools.com/GTEngine/Include/Mathematics/GteDistRaySegment.h

params.name: pointOnRay
params.description: If provided, the point on this Ray that is closest to the segment will be stored in this vector.

params.name: pointOnSegment
params.description: If provided, the point on the line segment that is closest to this ray will be stored in this vector.

return.description: The smallest distance between the ray and the segment defined by v0 and v1.

name: intersectSphere
description: Finds the point where this ray intersects the given sphere.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

return.description: The point of intersection, or null if there is none.

name: intersectsSphere
description: Determines whether this ray intersects the given sphere.

return.description: Whether this ray intersects the given sphere.

name: intersectPlane
description: Finds the point where this ray intersects the given plane.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

return.description: The point of intersection, or null if there is none.

name: intersectsPlane
description: Determines whether this ray intersects the given plane.

return.description: Whether this ray intersects the given plane.

name: intersectBox
description: Finds the point where this ray intersects the given box.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

return.description: The point of intersection, or null if there is none.

name: intersectsBox
description: Determines whether this ray intersects the given box.

return.description: Whether this ray intersects the given box.

name: intersectTriangle
description:
Finds the point where this ray intersects the given triangle.

Based on:
 http://www.geometrictools.com/GTEngine/Include/Mathematics/GteIntrRay3Triangle3.h

params.name: backfaceCulling
params.description: Whether backface culling should be considered.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

return.description: The point of intersection, or null if there is none.

name: applyMatrix4
description: Applies the given matrix to this ray.

name: equals
description: Checks if this ray equals the given one.

name: src/RotationOrder.js
content:
/**
 * An enumeration of Euler rotation orders.
 *
 * @type {Object}
 * @property {String} XYZ - X -> Y -> Z.
 * @property {String} YZX - Y -> Z -> X.
 * @property {String} ZXY - Z -> X -> Y.
 * @property {String} XZY - X -> Z -> Y.
 * @property {String} YXZ - Y -> X -> Z.
 * @property {String} ZYX - Z -> Y -> X.
 */

export const RotationOrder = {

	XYZ: "XYZ",
	YZX: "YZX",
	ZXY: "ZXY",
	XZY: "XZY",
	YXZ: "YXZ",
	ZYX: "ZYX"

};

name: RotationOrder
description: An enumeration of Euler rotation orders.

name: src/Sphere.js
box
description: A box.

name: Sphere
description: A sphere.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new sphere.

name: center
description: The center.

name: radius
description: The radius.

name: set
description: Sets the center and the radius.

name: copy
description: Copies the given sphere.

name: clone
description: Clones this sphere.

name: setFromPoints
description: Sets this sphere from points.

name: getBoundingBox
description: Calculates the bounding box of this sphere.

params.name: target
params.description: A target sphere. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: isEmpty
description: Checks if this sphere is empty.

name: translate
description: Translates this sphere.

name: clampPoint
description: Clamps the given point to this sphere.

params.name: target
params.description: A target vector. If none is provided, a new one will be created.

name: distanceToPoint
description: Calculates the distance from this sphere to the given point.

name: containsPoint
description: Checks if the given point lies inside this sphere.

return.description: Whether this sphere contains the point.

name: intersectsSphere
description: Checks if the this sphere intersects with the given one.

return.description: Whether this sphere intersects with the given one.

name: intersectsBox
description: Checks if the this sphere intersects with the given box.

return.description: Whether this sphere intersects with the given box.

name: intersectsPlane
description: Checks if the this sphere intersects with the given plane.

return.description: Whether this sphere intersects with the given plane.

name: equals
description: Checks if this sphere equals the given one.

name: src/Spherical.js
Spherical
description:
A spherical coordinate system.

For details see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spherical_coordinate_system

The poles (phi) are at the positive and negative Y-axis. The equator starts
at positive Z.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new spherical system.

name: radius
description: The radius of the sphere.

name: phi
description: The polar angle, up and down towards the top and bottom pole.

name: theta
description: The angle around the equator of the sphere.

name: set
description: Sets the values of this spherical system.

name: copy
description: Copies the values of the given spherical system.

name: clone
description: Clones this spherical system.

name: setFromVector3
description:
Sets the values of this spherical system based on a vector.

The radius is set to the vector's length while phi and theta are set from
its direction.

name: makeSafe
description: Restricts phi to `[1e-6, PI - 1e-6]`.

name: src/SymmetricMatrix3.js
SymmetricMatrix3
description: A symmetric 3x3 matrix.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a new symmetric matrix.

name: elements
description: The matrix elements.

name: set
description: Sets the values of this matrix.

params.name: m00
params.description: The value of the first row, first column.

params.name: m01
params.description: The value of the first row, second column and the second row, first column.

params.name: m02
params.description: The value of the first row, third column and the third row, first column.

params.name: m11
params.description: The value of the second row, second column.

params.name: m12
params.description: The value of the second row, third column and third row, second column.

params.name: m22
params.description: The value of the third row, third column.

name: identity
description: Sets this matrix to the identity matrix.

name: copy
description: Copies the values of a given symmetric matrix.

name: clone
description: Clones this matrix.

name: toMatrix3
description: Copies this symmetric matrix into a given 3x3 matrix.

name: add
description: Adds the values of a given symmetric matrix to this one.

name: norm
description: Calculates the Frobenius norm of this matrix.

name: off
description:
Calculates the absolute sum of all matrix components except for the main
diagonal.

name: applyToVector3
description: Applies this symmetric matrix to a vector.

name: equals
description: Checks if this matrix equals the given one.

name: calculateIndex
description:
Calculates the linear index of an element from this matrix.

Let N be the dimension of the symmetric matrix:

    index = N * (N - 1) / 2 - (N - i) * (N - i - 1) / 2 + j

return.description: The index into the elements of this matrix.

 http://www.euclideanspace.com/maths/geometry/rotations/conversions/quaternionToAngle/index.htm

params.description: A quaternion. Assumed to be normalized

name: setAxisAngleFromRotationMatrix
description:
Stores the axis angle from the given rotation matrix in this vector.

For more details see:
 http://www.euclideanspace.com/maths/geometry/rotations/conversions/matrixToAngle/index.htm

params.description: A matrix. The upper 3x3 must be a pure rotation matrix (i.e. unscaled).

content:
# Math-DS

[![Build status](https://travis-ci.org/vanruesc/math-ds.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/vanruesc/math-ds)
[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/math-ds.svg)](http://badge.fury.io/js/math-ds)
[![Dependencies](https://david-dm.org/vanruesc/math-ds.svg?branch=master)](https://david-dm.org/vanruesc/math-ds)

A collection of mathematical data structures.

*[API Reference](http://vanruesc.github.io/math-ds/docs)*


## Installation

```sh
npm install math-ds
``` 


## Contributing

Maintain the existing coding style. Add unit tests for any new or changed functionality. Lint and test your code.


## License

This library is licensed under the [Zlib license](https://github.com/vanruesc/math-ds/blob/master/LICENSE.md).

The original code that this library is based on, was written by [Mikael Emtinger](http://gomo.se),
[alteredq](http://alteredqualia.com), [WestLangley](http://github.com/WestLangley),
[mrdoob](http://mrdoob.com), [supereggbert](http://www.paulbrunt.co.uk),
[philogb](http://blog.thejit.org), [jordi_ros](http://plattsoft.com),
[timknip](http://www.floorplanner.com) and [bhouston](http://clara.io)
and is licensed under the [MIT license](https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/blob/master/LICENSE).
name: ./README.md

content:
{
	"name": "math-ds",
	"version": "0.5.2",
	"description": "Mathematical data structures.",
	"homepage": "https://github.com/vanruesc/math-ds",
	"main": "build/math-ds.js",
	"module": "src/index.js",
	"license": "Zlib",

	"keywords": [
		"mathematical",
		"data",
		"structures",
		"vector",
		"matrix",
		"aabb",
		"line",
		"euler",
		"frustum",
		"quaternion",
		"plane",
		"ray",
		"sphere",
		"spherical",
		"cylindrical",
		"2d",
		"3d"
	],

	"author": {
		"name": "Raoul van Rüschen",
		"email": "vanruesc@outlook.de"
	},

	"repository": {
		"type": "git",
		"url": "https://github.com/vanruesc/math-ds.git"
	},

	"bugs": {
		"url": "https://github.com/vanruesc/math-ds/issues"
	},

	"files": [
		"src",
		"build"
	],

	"scripts": {
		"test": "grunt --production"
	},

	"engines": {
		"node": ">=4.0.0",
		"npm": ">=4.0.0"
	},

	"eslintConfig": {
		"extends": "delta"
	},

	"devDependencies": {
		"@vanruesc/grunt-esdoc": "0.x.x",
		"babel-core": "6.x.x",
		"babel-plugin-external-helpers": "6.x.x",
		"babel-preset-env": "1.x.x",
		"esdoc-standard-plugin": "1.x.x",
		"eslint-config-delta": "0.x.x",
		"grunt": "1.x.x",
		"grunt-cli": "1.x.x",
		"grunt-contrib-nodeunit": "1.x.x",
		"grunt-contrib-uglify": "3.x.x",
		"grunt-eslint": "20.x.x",
		"grunt-rollup": "9.x.x",
		"jit-grunt": "0.x.x",
		"load-grunt-config": "0.x.x",
		"rollup-plugin-babel": "3.x.x",
		"rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "3.x.x",
		"time-grunt": "1.x.x"
	}
}
name: package.json
